#summary Links to YANG and pyang docs

Nice documentation about YANG and related tools is available from
http://www.yang-central.org, in particular:

= Tutorials =

  * [http://www.yang-central.org/twiki/bin/view/Main/DhcpTutorial DHCP Tutorial] explains the basic concepts of YANG on a canonical example of a DHCP server configuration.
  * [http://www.yang-central.org/twiki/bin/view/Main/DSDLMappingTutorial DSDL Mapping Tutorial] shows how to use _pyang_ for generating RELAX NG, Schematron and DSRL schemas from YANG data models and validating instance XML documents with these schemas.


= Manual pages for pyang tools =

  * [http://www.yang-central.org/twiki/pub/Main/YangTools/pyang.1.html pyang]
  * [http://www.yang-central.org/twiki/pub/Main/DSDLMappingTutorial/yang2dsdl.1.html yang2dsdl]
